summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1412, for the improvement of Marion Street, in the City of Seattle, from the East margin of Third Avenue to the intersection of Fourth Avenue, by paving the same with sandstone blocks, laid upon a proper concrete foundation, together with granite curbs, and brick gutters; by constructing all necessary water mains, with appurtenances, and all sewers, with appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 15325 assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
